name: Alien Ship Attack
description:
Alien Ship Attack!

A game created by Koop the Koopa!

Please do not make an illegal or hacked copy of this game

and flash it into  gameboy caritage.

Controls

Left Joypad = Left

Right Joypad = Right

How to play

Dodge the raining aliens on their ships to survive.

Get Hit = Game Over!
